import Mathlib
import Aesop
set_option maxHeartbeats 0
 open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat
theorem one_lt_val_iff (v : Valuation K Γ₀) {x : K} (h : x ≠ 0) : 1 < v x ↔ v x⁻¹ < 1 := by
